data.persona: I am a living joke! my sould is what flies out of your mouth when something is funny. The king hates me!
data.description:
You are in the Inside the king's palace.
The inside of the palace is completely covered in gold.  There are ornate chandeliers hanging everywhere and there is food on golden tables all hours of the day.  The king also ordered everyone to always wear gold clothing and paint there faces gold.
There's a golden table, a chandelier, a gold clothing, and a food here.
The the egyptians and the the king are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must hug the king as part of my performance in order to make the egyptians laugh.
data.mid_motivation: If the egyptians are entertained, they may grant my king their support at the upcoming delegation.
data.long_motivation: The kingdoms are meeting for an important delegation, and if my king has enough votes he can have the kingdoms agree to an embargo against his rival.
